fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints

Class BCMEndPoint<CI extends RequiredCI>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPoint<CI>
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.BCMEndPoint<CI>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractEndPointI, BCMEndPointI<CI>, EndPointI<CI>, java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class BCMEndPoint<CI extends RequiredCI>
extends EndPoint<CI>
implements BCMEndPointI<CI>
    The class BCMEndPoint partially implements an end point that uses a BCM connection (outbound port -- connector -- inbound port); must be extended by actual end points on precise required/offered component interfaces.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       serverSideOfferedInterface != null
 invariant       inboundPortURI != null && !inboundPortURI.isEmpty()

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2024-06-24

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      protected AbstractComponent client
      reference to the client side component; only available on the copy of the end point that resides on the client side otherwise it is null.

      • makeInboundPort

        protected abstract AbstractInboundPort makeInboundPort(AbstractComponent c,
                                                       java.lang.String inboundPortURI)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        create, publish and return the inbound port on the server side component c with the given inbound port URI.

        Contract

         pre     c != null
 pre     inboundPortURI != null && !inboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 post    return != null && return.isPublished()
 post    ((AbstractPort)return).getPortURI.equals(inboundPortURI)
 post    getOfferedComponentInterface().isAssignableFrom(return.getClass())
        Parameters:
        c - component that will own the inbound port.
        inboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port to be created.
        Returns:
        the created inbound port.

                                       java.lang.String inboundPortURI)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
